channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-22782|2024-08-03T03:21:49.155Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20client%20for%20meetings%20for%20windows
item.description: The Zoom Client for Meetings for Windows prior to version 5.9.7, Zoom Rooms for Conference Room for Windows prior to version 5.10.0, Zoom Plugins for Microsoft Outlook for Windows prior to version 5.10.3, and Zoom VDI Windows Meeting Clients prior to version 5.9.6; was susceptible to a local privilege escalation issue during the installer repair operation. A malicious actor could utilize this to potentially delete system level files or folders, causing integrity or availability issues on the userâ€™s host machine.

item.title: CVE-2022-22786|2024-08-03T03:21:49.134Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20client%20for%20meetings%20for%20windows
item.description: The Zoom Client for Meetings for Windows before version 5.10.0 and Zoom Rooms for Conference Room for Windows before version 5.10.0, fails to properly check the installation version during the update process. This issue could be used in a more sophisticated attack to trick a user into downgrading their Zoom client to a less secure version.
